SEARCH
Module com.example.projectfx
Package Projects

Class A32_TM_ServerModel

java.lang.Object
Projects.A32_TM_ServerModel
public class A32_TM_ServerModel extends Object
A32_TM_ServerModel represents the data model for the Turing Machine server application. It encapsulates the functionality related to encoding and decoding messages, extracting information from messages, and validating Turing Machine models. This class is part of the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture, where it acts as the model that holds and manages data used by the server.
